--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> Vorpal is a major NPC. I have no trouble about someone else
> controlling him. By the way, who were the other minions?

Thanks.

As to who the other minions are, I think Nightstrike is considered a
Minion? I believe there were others as well I saw in the old messeges.
I am not sure who else is left ... if anyone else is. At the moment
there is just Cyclonus, Scourge and the sweeps .. and of course any
others that care to be created or revived. As was said, this is a
perfect opportunity to get on board the Minion train!

Preston
(Da'minion)
